text: Wilburn Kirby Ross (May 12, 1922 - May 9, 2017) was a retired United States Army soldier. He is a recipient of the United States military's highest decoration—the Medal of Honor—for his actions in World War II. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1922 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American military personnel of the Korean War Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Medal of Honor recipients Category:Military people from Kentucky
title: Wilburn K. Ross
